item.description:
Presented by one the of the largest educational, humanitarian organization in the world: www.artofliving.org

Experience the power of breath with ancient breathing techniques (Pranayaam), simple yet powerful "Subtle" Yoga, become aware of the secrets of the mind and finally..... dive into the depths of consciousness with a soothing guided meditation.

Benefits: Eliminates Stress...
Gain Calmness and Clarity...
Improve Health: Physically-Mentally-Emotionally

Time: 10am - 12pm

Meeting Location: MIT Student Center, Mezzanine Floor, Room W20-307 (building is on right side of mass ave if heading towards mass ave bridge). It is opposite to 77 mass ave (main entrance to MIT). It is near the athletic fields. Make sure to show up a few minutes early in case you need to ask someone on campus for directions!

Looking forward to meeting you all very soon...
item.name: Mind and Meditation Workshop by Art of Living
